column1: better than any you can get at a restaurant!
I cut back on the mayo, and made up the difference with sour cream to adjust the stiffness of the dip.
i think i did something wrong because i could taste the cornstarch in the finished product.
easily the best i have ever had.  juicy flavorful, not dry.  the vegetables retain crispness as well, not bland at all!
love it, but without the bean sprouts.
chewy goodness, not crispy at all. i even threw in craisins and left the oatmeal whole, and they were great.
Would someone please check the Nutrition Facts of this recipe.
this is absolutely delicious.  i even served it with lime slices so you could squeeze on more of the acid.
